alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 4:15AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN ORANGE COUNTY THROUGH 515 AM EDT... At 415 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Liberty to near Bushkill. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Middletown, Port Jervis, Goshen, Howells, Montgomery, Florida, Cuddebackville, Otisville, Huguenot, Unionville, Scotchtown, Deerpark, Mechanicstown, Westtown, and Slate Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
